A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Meh\, plot holes galore. Rian Johnson's direction felt very different from jj Abrams. Several characters didn't really have purpose so plot lines created just for them. Lots of stuff that didn't get explains like Snoke. Who is he? Doesn't matter\, he's dead. Moving on. Why can't general purple hair explain the goal of escaping to the planet rather than keep it a secret? Just to make a point of making an enemy of Poe and his toxic masculinity? If the rebels could destroy the first order ship with using light speed why not just use those other ships at the beginning instead of letting them all get picked off one by one? Moving on...
